entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
